item.title: How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money
item.description:
How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money

How to successfully book your first-choice listings and get them for cheaper.

item.title: Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina
item.description:
Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina

There are many stunning, otherworldly sights in Ex Machina, the science-fiction film directed by Alex Garland that features a robot so lifelike she's played by actress Alicia Vikander. But the most breathtaking sight of all may be the 100 percent real, available-for-a-night's-stay location where the film is set: the Juvet Landscape Hotel in Norway.

item.title: Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.
item.description:
Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.

Aboard commercial cargo ships is where the Container Artist Residency 01 program is finding its abode. Completely isolated from the rest of the world, the Residency allows its artists to work in a remote space with no tangible lines of communication to the outside world.

item.title: 7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.
item.description:
7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.

If Spring had an official cocktail, the Pimm's Cup would be it. It's ultra-refreshing, bright and vibrant-and as easy to make as it is to drink. To mix a basic version of the classic British cocktail, all you need is Pimm's No. 1, ginger ale (or some sort of lemon-lime soda), cucumber and lemon.
